msg: Fix for slave segfault on framework exit (contributed by Vinod Kone, https://reviews.apache.org/r/5057).

author: benh
msg: Updated the strings::pairs function to take multiple delimiters (https://reviews.apache.org/r/5103).

author: benh
msg: Bug fixes for libprocess that make sendfile actually work correctly. In addition, this adds MIME support for sending files (https://reviews.apache.org/r/5102).
